attributes.title: stole my info & and the app is messed up
attributes.review: ok first of all, this app is messed up. it said “turn on notifications and it will steal all of your information on your iphone, it will know who you’re texting, it will steal EVERYTHING on your phone. are you sure you want to turn on the notifications? when i refused to turn on the notifications, it suddenly started playing 💞four in her💞four in her💞four in her💞four in her💞four in her💞foreigner💞💞foreigner💞foreigner💞four in her💞and then all these sentences and emojis popped up like- it had the fairy emojis in it. “you just made my day 😍💖🎀🌹🙈🧚🏼‍♂️ WORSE 🧚🏼👺✨💞👁👅👁” “you’re in my fyp ✨🥺🧚🏼‍♂️🌈💥💕 better refresh 💜🧸🎈🎊⭐️🧚🏼🤪” “❤️heart been💔broke so many times⏰i i dont 🤷‍♀️know what to believe💭yeah👍” “everyone deserves human rights✨🧚🏼🌸not you tho🥰💖💫” “you dropped your crown🧚🏼‍♂️🥰🧚🏼💖 lets keep it there💞✨” “wow you seriously just did that✨🧚🏼⚡️never do it again❤️🥰🥳” “oh to see without my eyes ➖👄➖” “people are so judgy🧸🎀🌷💗listen to them💙🧚🏼🦋🥰” “you’re so brave😜🌸✨you shouldnt be⚡️💖🎀” “its good to have dreams💜🌸🧚🏼💫you should give up on yours🧸🌷⚡️🦋” “you’re so down to earth😘💋🧚🏼🙈let me know when the burial is🐚🌼❣️⭐️” “you can do anything🌏🌙🌺just not this🦧🧚🏼💄🥳” “embrace your insecurities😌👺🎀🤍just not this one💚🧚🏼👠” “imagine being that talented🐤🦋🧚🏼‍♂️yeah keep imagining🥺🥰🧸🎈” “you dropped this🎁🧸🦋😍put it back on your nose😘👺💄🧚🏼” “heres the door for new opportunities🧚🏻‍♀️🧢🐣🌝i locked it for you🖤🦠✨” it said those were for donald trump. 🥺✨
